scripts.dev:
echo "Please run one of these commands:

yarn dev:web

yarn dev:mobile

yarn dev:all
"
scripts.dev:web: yarn && npm-run-all data:sync api:sync -p data:build api:build -p web:sync:watch web:dev data:sync:watch data:dev api:sync:watch api:dev data:build:watch api:build:watch
scripts.dev:mobile: yarn && npm-run-all data:sync api:sync -p data:build api:build -p mobile:sync:watch mobile:dev data:sync:watch data:dev api:sync:watch api:dev data:build:watch api:build:watch
scripts.dev:all: yarn && npm-run-all data:sync api:sync -p data:build api:build -p web:sync:watch web:dev mobile:sync:watch mobile:dev data:sync:watch data:dev api:sync:watch api:dev data:build:watch api:build:watch
